body: Decided to teach myself how to #juggle! Here’s my progress after a week—still dropping a few, but getting there! #skills #progress

comments.body: This is awesome! Juggling is so hard! How long can you keep it going before dropping one?
@89898 Thanks! I can keep it going for about 30 seconds before something goes rogue, haha.
Not bad at all! Are you using juggling balls or something else?
@56565 Just basic juggling balls for now. I’m thinking about trying clubs next, but that’s probably a ways off!
I’m impressed! How did you even start learning? Did you use any tutorials?
@67676 Yeah, I followed a few YouTube tutorials. It’s all about practicing the throw before worrying about catching!
I can’t even juggle two things, let alone three! Any tips for a total beginner?
@23232 Start with just one ball and practice the throw. Once you get the rhythm down, it gets easier. Trust me!
@34343 Haha, maybe one day! Let me master regular juggling first before I start juggling anything on fire!
